Functions.Name: get_file_extension
Functions.Definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_file_extension(path text)
 RETURNS text
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 IMMUTABLE
AS $function$ BEGIN
    RETURN substring(path FROM '\.([^\.]*)$');
END; $function$

Functions.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private_delete
Functions.Definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.lsif_data_docs_search_private_delete()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
UPDATE lsif_data_apidocs_num_search_results_private SET count = count - (select count(*) from oldtbl);
RETURN NULL;
END $function$

Functions.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private_insert
Functions.Definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.lsif_data_docs_search_private_insert()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
UPDATE lsif_data_apidocs_num_search_results_private SET count = count + (select count(*) from newtbl);
RETURN NULL;
END $function$

Functions.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_public_insert

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.lsif_data_docs_search_public_insert()

Functions.Name: lsif_data_documentation_pages_delete
lsif_data_documentation_pages_insert
lsif_data_documentation_pages_update
Functions.Definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.lsif_data_documentation_pages_update()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
WITH
    beforeIndexed AS (SELECT count(DISTINCT dump_id) FROM oldtbl WHERE search_indexed='true'),
    afterIndexed AS (SELECT count(DISTINCT dump_id) FROM newtbl WHERE search_indexed='true')
UPDATE lsif_data_apidocs_num_dumps_indexed SET count=count + ((select * from afterIndexed) - (select * from beforeIndexed));
RETURN NULL;
END $function$

Functions.Name: path_prefixes
Functions.Definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.path_prefixes(path text)
 RETURNS text[]
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 IMMUTABLE
AS $function$ BEGIN
    RETURN (
        SELECT array_agg(array_to_string(components[:len], '/')) prefixes
        FROM
            (SELECT regexp_split_to_array(path, E'/') components) t,
            generate_series(1, array_length(components, 1)) AS len
    );
END; $function$

Functions.Name: singleton
Functions.Definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.singleton(value text)
 RETURNS text[]
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 IMMUTABLE
AS $function$ BEGIN
    RETURN ARRAY[value];
END; $function$

Functions.Name: singleton_integer
Functions.Definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.singleton_integer(value integer)
 RETURNS integer[]
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 IMMUTABLE
AS $function$ BEGIN
    RETURN ARRAY[value];
END; $function$

Functions.Name: update_lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions_insert
Functions.Definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.update_lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions_insert()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$ BEGIN
    INSERT INTO
        lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions
    SELECT
        dump_id,
        MIN(schema_version) as min_schema_version,
        MAX(schema_version) as max_schema_version
    FROM
        newtab
    GROUP BY
        dump_id
    ON CONFLICT (dump_id) DO UPDATE SET
        -- Update with min(old_min, new_min) and max(old_max, new_max)
        min_schema_version = LEAST(lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions.min_schema_version, EXCLUDED.min_schema_version),
        max_schema_version = GREATEST(lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions.max_schema_version, EXCLUDED.max_schema_version);

    RETURN NULL;
END $function$

Functions.Name: update_lsif_data_documents_schema_versions_insert
Functions.Definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.update_lsif_data_documents_schema_versions_insert()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$ BEGIN
    INSERT INTO
        lsif_data_documents_schema_versions
    SELECT
        dump_id,
        MIN(schema_version) as min_schema_version,
        MAX(schema_version) as max_schema_version
    FROM
        newtab
    GROUP BY
        dump_id
    ON CONFLICT (dump_id) DO UPDATE SET
        -- Update with min(old_min, new_min) and max(old_max, new_max)
        min_schema_version = LEAST(lsif_data_documents_schema_versions.min_schema_version, EXCLUDED.min_schema_version),
        max_schema_version = GREATEST(lsif_data_documents_schema_versions.max_schema_version, EXCLUDED.max_schema_version);

    RETURN NULL;
END $function$

Functions.Name: update_lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions_insert
Functions.Definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.update_lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions_insert()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$ BEGIN
    INSERT INTO
        lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions
    SELECT
        dump_id,
        MIN(schema_version) as min_schema_version,
        MAX(schema_version) as max_schema_version
    FROM
        newtab
    GROUP BY
        dump_id
    ON CONFLICT (dump_id) DO UPDATE SET
        -- Update with min(old_min, new_min) and max(old_max, new_max)
        min_schema_version = LEAST   (lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions.min_schema_version, EXCLUDED.min_schema_version),
        max_schema_version = GREATEST(lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions.max_schema_version, EXCLUDED.max_schema_version);

    RETURN NULL;
END $function$

Functions.Name: update_lsif_data_references_schema_versions_insert
Functions.Definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.update_lsif_data_references_schema_versions_insert()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$ BEGIN
    INSERT INTO
        lsif_data_references_schema_versions
    SELECT
        dump_id,
        MIN(schema_version) as min_schema_version,
        MAX(schema_version) as max_schema_version
    FROM
        newtab
    GROUP BY
        dump_id
    ON CONFLICT (dump_id) DO UPDATE SET
        -- Update with min(old_min, new_min) and max(old_max, new_max)
        min_schema_version = LEAST(lsif_data_references_schema_versions.min_schema_version, EXCLUDED.min_schema_version),
        max_schema_version = GREATEST(lsif_data_references_schema_versions.max_schema_version, EXCLUDED.max_schema_version);

    RETURN NULL;
END $function$

Tables.Name: lsif_data_definitions
Tables.Comment: Associates (document, range) pairs with the import monikers attached to the range.

Columns.Name: data
Columns.Comment: A gob-encoded payload conforming to an array of [LocationData](https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/sourcegraph/sourcegraph@3.26/-/blob/enterprise/lib/codeintel/semantic/types.go#L106:6) types.

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table (state=completed).

Columns.Name: identifier
Columns.Comment: The moniker identifier.

Columns.Name: num_locations
Columns.Comment: The number of locations stored in the data field.

Columns.Name: schema_version
Columns.Comment: The schema version of this row - used to determine presence and encoding of data.

Columns.Name: scheme
Columns.Comment: The moniker scheme.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_definitions_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_definitions_pkey ON lsif_data_definitions USING btree (dump_id, scheme, identifier)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_definitions_dump_id_schema_version
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_definitions_dump_id_schema_version ON lsif_data_definitions USING btree (dump_id, schema_version)

Triggers.Name: lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions_insert
Triggers.Definition: CREATE TRIGGER lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions_insert AFTER INSERT ON lsif_data_definitions REFERENCING NEW TABLE AS newtab FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE FUNCTION update_lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions_insert()

Tables.Name: lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions
Tables.Comment: Tracks the range of schema_versions for each upload in the lsif_data_definitions table.

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table.

Columns.Name: max_schema_version
Columns.Comment: An upper-bound on the `lsif_data_definitions.schema_version` where `lsif_data_definitions.dump_id = dump_id`.

Columns.Name: min_schema_version
Columns.Comment: A lower-bound on the `lsif_data_definitions.schema_version` where `lsif_data_definitions.dump_id = dump_id`.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions_pkey ON lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions USING btree (dump_id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions_dump_id_schema_version_bo
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions_dump_id_schema_version_bo ON lsif_data_definitions_schema_versions USING btree (dump_id, min_schema_version, max_schema_version)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_current_private
Tables.Comment: A table indicating the most current search index for a unique repository, root, and language.

Columns.Name: created_at
Columns.Comment: The time this record was inserted. The records with the latest created_at value for the same repository, root, and language is the only visible one and others will be deleted asynchronously.

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The associated dump identifier.

Columns.Name: dump_root
Columns.Comment: The root of the associated dump.

Columns.Name: lang_name_id
Columns.Comment: The interned index name of the associated dump.

Columns.Name: last_cleanup_scan_at
Columns.Comment: The last time this record was checked as part of a data retention scan.

Columns.Name: repo_id
Columns.Comment: The repository identifier of the associated dump.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_current_private_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_current_private_pkey ON lsif_data_docs_search_current_private USING btree (id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_current_private_last_cleanup_scan_at
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_current_private_last_cleanup_scan_at ON lsif_data_docs_search_current_private USING btree (last_cleanup_scan_at)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_current_private_lookup
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_current_private_lookup ON lsif_data_docs_search_current_private USING btree (repo_id, dump_root, lang_name_id, created_at) INCLUDE (dump_id)

Columns.Name: repo_id

Tables.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_private
Tables.Comment: Each unique language name being stored in the API docs search index.

Columns.Name: id
Columns.Comment: The ID of the language name.

Columns.Name: lang_name
Columns.Comment: The lowercase language name (go, java, etc.) OR, if unknown, the LSIF indexer name.

Columns.Name: tsv
Columns.Comment: Indexed tsvector for the lang_name field. Crafted for ordered, case, and punctuation sensitivity, see data_write_documentation.go:textSearchVector.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_private_lang_name_key
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_private_lang_name_key ON lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_private USING btree (lang_name)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_private_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_private_pkey ON lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_private USING btree (id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_private_tsv_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_private_tsv_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_private USING gin (tsv)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_public
Tables.Comment: Each unique language name being stored in the API docs search index.

Columns.Name: id
Columns.Comment: The ID of the language name.

Columns.Name: lang_name
Columns.Comment: The lowercase language name (go, java, etc.) OR, if unknown, the LSIF indexer name.

Columns.Name: tsv
Columns.Comment: Indexed tsvector for the lang_name field. Crafted for ordered, case, and punctuation sensitivity, see data_write_documentation.go:textSearchVector.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_public_lang_name_key
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_public_lang_name_key ON lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_public USING btree (lang_name)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_public_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_public_pkey ON lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_public USING btree (id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_public_tsv_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_public_tsv_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_public USING gin (tsv)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private
Tables.Comment: A tsvector search index over API documentation (private repos only)

Columns.Name: detail
Columns.Comment: The detail string (e.g. the full function signature and its docs). See protocol/documentation.go:Documentation

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table (state=completed).

Columns.Name: dump_root
Columns.Comment: Identical to lsif_dumps.root; The working directory of the indexer image relative to the repository root.

Columns.Name: id
Columns.Comment: The row ID of the search result.

Columns.Name: label
Columns.Comment: The label string of the result, e.g. a one-line function signature. See protocol/documentation.go:Documentation

Columns.Name: label_reverse_tsv
Columns.Comment: Indexed tsvector for the reverse of the label field, for suffix lexeme/word matching. Crafted for ordered, case, and punctuation sensitivity, see data_write_documentation.go:textSearchVector.

Columns.Name: label_tsv
Columns.Comment: Indexed tsvector for the label field. Crafted for ordered, case, and punctuation sensitivity, see data_write_documentation.go:textSearchVector.

Columns.Name: lang_name_id
Columns.Comment: The programming language (or indexer name) that produced the result. Foreign key into lsif_data_docs_search_lang_names_private.

Columns.Name: path_id
Columns.Comment: The fully qualified documentation page path ID, e.g. including "#section". See GraphQL codeintel.schema:documentationPage for what this is.

Columns.Name: repo_id
Columns.Comment: The repo ID, from the main app DB repo table. Used to search over a select set of repos by ID.

Columns.Name: repo_name_id
Columns.Comment: The repository name that produced the result. Foreign key into lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_private.

Columns.Name: search_key
Columns.Comment: The search key generated by the indexer, e.g. mux.Router.ServeHTTP. It is language-specific, and likely unique within a repository (but not always.) See protocol/documentation.go:Documentation.SearchKey

Columns.Name: search_key_reverse_tsv
Columns.Comment: Indexed tsvector for the reverse of the search_key field, for suffix lexeme/word matching. Crafted for ordered, case, and punctuation sensitivity, see data_write_documentation.go:textSearchVector.

Columns.Name: search_key_tsv
Columns.Comment: Indexed tsvector for the search_key field. Crafted for ordered, case, and punctuation sensitivity, see data_write_documentation.go:textSearchVector.

Columns.Name: tags_id
Columns.Comment: The tags from the documentation node. Foreign key into lsif_data_docs_search_tags_private.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_private_pkey ON lsif_data_docs_search_private USING btree (id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private_dump_id_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_private_dump_id_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_private USING btree (dump_id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private_dump_root_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_private_dump_root_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_private USING btree (dump_root)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private_label_reverse_tsv_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_private_label_reverse_tsv_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_private USING gin (label_reverse_tsv)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private_label_tsv_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_private_label_tsv_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_private USING gin (label_tsv)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private_repo_id_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_private_repo_id_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_private USING btree (repo_id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private_search_key_reverse_tsv_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_private_search_key_reverse_tsv_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_private USING gin (search_key_reverse_tsv)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private_search_key_tsv_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_private_search_key_tsv_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_private USING gin (search_key_tsv)

Triggers.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private_delete
Triggers.Definition: CREATE TRIGGER lsif_data_docs_search_private_delete AFTER DELETE ON lsif_data_docs_search_private REFERENCING OLD TABLE AS oldtbl FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE FUNCTION lsif_data_docs_search_private_delete()

Triggers.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_private_insert
Triggers.Definition: CREATE TRIGGER lsif_data_docs_search_private_insert AFTER INSERT ON lsif_data_docs_search_private REFERENCING NEW TABLE AS newtbl FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE FUNCTION lsif_data_docs_search_private_insert()

Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_private_repo_name_key ON lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_private USING btree (repo_name)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_private_reverse_tsv_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_private_reverse_tsv_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_private USING gin (reverse_tsv)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_private_tsv_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_private_tsv_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_private USING gin (tsv)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public
Tables.Comment: Each unique repository name being stored in the API docs search index.

Columns.Name: id
Columns.Comment: The ID of the repository name.

Columns.Name: repo_name
Columns.Comment: The fully qualified name of the repository.

Columns.Name: reverse_tsv
Columns.Comment: Indexed tsvector for the reverse of the lang_name field, for suffix lexeme/word matching. Crafted for ordered, case, and punctuation sensitivity, see data_write_documentation.go:textSearchVector.

Columns.Name: tsv
Columns.Comment: Indexed tsvector for the lang_name field. Crafted for ordered, case, and punctuation sensitivity, see data_write_documentation.go:textSearchVector.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public_pkey ON lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public USING btree (id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public_repo_name_key
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public_repo_name_key ON lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public USING btree (repo_name)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public_reverse_tsv_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public_reverse_tsv_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public USING gin (reverse_tsv)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public_tsv_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public_tsv_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_repo_names_public USING gin (tsv)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_tags_private
Tables.Comment: Each uniques sequence of space-separated tags being stored in the API docs search index.

Columns.Name: id
Columns.Comment: The ID of the tags.

Columns.Name: tags
Columns.Comment: The full sequence of space-separated tags. See protocol/documentation.go:Documentation

Columns.Name: tsv
Columns.Comment: Indexed tsvector for the tags field. Crafted for ordered, case, and punctuation sensitivity, see data_write_documentation.go:textSearchVector.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_tags_private_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_tags_private_pkey ON lsif_data_docs_search_tags_private USING btree (id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_tags_private_tags_key
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_tags_private_tags_key ON lsif_data_docs_search_tags_private USING btree (tags)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_tags_private_tsv_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_tags_private_tsv_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_tags_private USING gin (tsv)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_tags_public
Tables.Comment: Each uniques sequence of space-separated tags being stored in the API docs search index.

Columns.Name: id
Columns.Comment: The ID of the tags.

Columns.Name: tags
Columns.Comment: The full sequence of space-separated tags. See protocol/documentation.go:Documentation

Columns.Name: tsv
Columns.Comment: Indexed tsvector for the tags field. Crafted for ordered, case, and punctuation sensitivity, see data_write_documentation.go:textSearchVector.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_tags_public_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_tags_public_pkey ON lsif_data_docs_search_tags_public USING btree (id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_tags_public_tags_key
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_tags_public_tags_key ON lsif_data_docs_search_tags_public USING btree (tags)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_docs_search_tags_public_tsv_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_docs_search_tags_public_tsv_idx ON lsif_data_docs_search_tags_public USING gin (tsv)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_documentation_mappings
Tables.Comment: Maps documentation path IDs to their corresponding integral documentationResult vertex IDs, which are unique within a dump.

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table (state=completed).

Columns.Name: file_path
Columns.Comment: The document file path for the documentationResult, if any. e.g. the path to the file where the symbol described by this documentationResult is located, if it is a symbol.

Columns.Name: path_id
Columns.Comment: The documentation page path ID, see see GraphQL codeintel.schema:documentationPage for what this is.

Columns.Name: result_id
Columns.Comment: The documentationResult vertex ID.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_documentation_mappings_inverse_unique_idx
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_documentation_mappings_inverse_unique_idx ON lsif_data_documentation_mappings USING btree (dump_id, result_id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_documentation_mappings_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_documentation_mappings_pkey ON lsif_data_documentation_mappings USING btree (dump_id, path_id)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_documentation_pages
Tables.Comment: Associates documentation pathIDs to their documentation page hierarchy chunk.

Columns.Name: data
Columns.Comment: A gob-encoded payload conforming to a `type DocumentationPageData struct` pointer (lib/codeintel/semantic/types.go)

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table (state=completed).

Columns.Name: path_id
Columns.Comment: The documentation page path ID, see see GraphQL codeintel.schema:documentationPage for what this is.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_documentation_pages_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_documentation_pages_pkey ON lsif_data_documentation_pages USING btree (dump_id, path_id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_documentation_pages_dump_id_unindexed
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_documentation_pages_dump_id_unindexed ON lsif_data_documentation_pages USING btree (dump_id) WHERE NOT search_indexed

Triggers.Name: lsif_data_documentation_pages_delete
Triggers.Definition: CREATE TRIGGER lsif_data_documentation_pages_delete AFTER DELETE ON lsif_data_documentation_pages REFERENCING OLD TABLE AS oldtbl FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE FUNCTION lsif_data_documentation_pages_delete()

Triggers.Name: lsif_data_documentation_pages_insert
Triggers.Definition: CREATE TRIGGER lsif_data_documentation_pages_insert AFTER INSERT ON lsif_data_documentation_pages REFERENCING NEW TABLE AS newtbl FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE FUNCTION lsif_data_documentation_pages_insert()

Triggers.Name: lsif_data_documentation_pages_update
Triggers.Definition: CREATE TRIGGER lsif_data_documentation_pages_update AFTER UPDATE ON lsif_data_documentation_pages REFERENCING OLD TABLE AS oldtbl NEW TABLE AS newtbl FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE FUNCTION lsif_data_documentation_pages_update()

Tables.Name: lsif_data_documentation_path_info
Tables.Comment: Associates documentation page pathIDs to information about what is at that pathID, its immediate children, etc.

Columns.Name: data
Columns.Comment: A gob-encoded payload conforming to a `type DocumentationPathInoData struct` pointer (lib/codeintel/semantic/types.go)

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table (state=completed).

Columns.Name: path_id
Columns.Comment: The documentation page path ID, see see GraphQL codeintel.schema:documentationPage for what this is.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_documentation_path_info_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_documentation_path_info_pkey ON lsif_data_documentation_path_info USING btree (dump_id, path_id)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_documents
Tables.Comment: Stores reference, hover text, moniker, and diagnostic data about a particular text document witin a dump.

Columns.Name: data
Columns.Comment: A gob-encoded payload conforming to the [DocumentData](https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/sourcegraph/sourcegraph@3.26/-/blob/enterprise/lib/codeintel/semantic/types.go#L13:6) type. This field is being migrated across ranges, hovers, monikers, packages, and diagnostics columns and will be removed in a future release of Sourcegraph.

Columns.Name: diagnostics
Columns.Comment: A gob-encoded payload conforming to the [Diagnostics](https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/sourcegraph/sourcegraph@3.26/-/blob/enterprise/lib/codeintel/semantic/types.go#L18:2) field of the DocumentDatatype.

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table (state=completed).

Columns.Name: hovers
Columns.Comment: A gob-encoded payload conforming to the [HoversResults](https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/sourcegraph/sourcegraph@3.26/-/blob/enterprise/lib/codeintel/semantic/types.go#L15:2) field of the DocumentDatatype.

Columns.Name: monikers
Columns.Comment: A gob-encoded payload conforming to the [Monikers](https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/sourcegraph/sourcegraph@3.26/-/blob/enterprise/lib/codeintel/semantic/types.go#L16:2) field of the DocumentDatatype.

Columns.Name: num_diagnostics
Columns.Comment: The number of diagnostics stored in the data field.

Columns.Name: packages
Columns.Comment: A gob-encoded payload conforming to the [PackageInformation](https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/sourcegraph/sourcegraph@3.26/-/blob/enterprise/lib/codeintel/semantic/types.go#L17:2) field of the DocumentDatatype.

Columns.Name: path
Columns.Comment: The path of the text document relative to the associated dump root.

Columns.Name: ranges
Columns.Comment: A gob-encoded payload conforming to the [Ranges](https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/sourcegraph/sourcegraph@3.26/-/blob/enterprise/lib/codeintel/semantic/types.go#L14:2) field of the DocumentDatatype.

Columns.Name: schema_version
Columns.Comment: The schema version of this row - used to determine presence and encoding of data.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_documents_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_documents_pkey ON lsif_data_documents USING btree (dump_id, path)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_documents_dump_id_schema_version
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_documents_dump_id_schema_version ON lsif_data_documents USING btree (dump_id, schema_version)

Triggers.Name: lsif_data_documents_schema_versions_insert
Triggers.Definition: CREATE TRIGGER lsif_data_documents_schema_versions_insert AFTER INSERT ON lsif_data_documents REFERENCING NEW TABLE AS newtab FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE FUNCTION update_lsif_data_documents_schema_versions_insert()

Tables.Name: lsif_data_documents_schema_versions
Tables.Comment: Tracks the range of schema_versions for each upload in the lsif_data_documents table.

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table.

Columns.Name: max_schema_version
Columns.Comment: An upper-bound on the `lsif_data_documents.schema_version` where `lsif_data_documents.dump_id = dump_id`.

Columns.Name: min_schema_version
Columns.Comment: A lower-bound on the `lsif_data_documents.schema_version` where `lsif_data_documents.dump_id = dump_id`.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_documents_schema_versions_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_documents_schema_versions_pkey ON lsif_data_documents_schema_versions USING btree (dump_id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_documents_schema_versions_dump_id_schema_version_boun
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_documents_schema_versions_dump_id_schema_version_boun ON lsif_data_documents_schema_versions USING btree (dump_id, min_schema_version, max_schema_version)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_implementations
Tables.Comment: Associates (document, range) pairs with the implementation monikers attached to the range.

Columns.Name: data
Columns.Comment: A gob-encoded payload conforming to an array of [LocationData](https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/sourcegraph/sourcegraph@3.26/-/blob/enterprise/lib/codeintel/semantic/types.go#L106:6) types.

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table (state=completed).

Columns.Name: identifier
Columns.Comment: The moniker identifier.

Columns.Name: num_locations
Columns.Comment: The number of locations stored in the data field.

Columns.Name: schema_version
Columns.Comment: The schema version of this row - used to determine presence and encoding of data.

Columns.Name: scheme
Columns.Comment: The moniker scheme.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_implementations_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_implementations_pkey ON lsif_data_implementations USING btree (dump_id, scheme, identifier)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_implementations_dump_id_schema_version
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_implementations_dump_id_schema_version ON lsif_data_implementations USING btree (dump_id, schema_version)

Triggers.Name: lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions_insert
Triggers.Definition: CREATE TRIGGER lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions_insert AFTER INSERT ON lsif_data_implementations REFERENCING NEW TABLE AS newtab FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE FUNCTION update_lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions_insert()

Tables.Name: lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions
Tables.Comment: Tracks the range of schema_versions for each upload in the lsif_data_implementations table.

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table.

Columns.Name: max_schema_version
Columns.Comment: An upper-bound on the `lsif_data_implementations.schema_version` where `lsif_data_implementations.dump_id = dump_id`.

Columns.Name: min_schema_version
Columns.Comment: A lower-bound on the `lsif_data_implementations.schema_version` where `lsif_data_implementations.dump_id = dump_id`.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions_pkey ON lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions USING btree (dump_id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions_dump_id_schema_versio
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions_dump_id_schema_versio ON lsif_data_implementations_schema_versions USING btree (dump_id, min_schema_version, max_schema_version)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_metadata
Tables.Comment: Stores the number of result chunks associated with a dump.

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table (state=completed).

Columns.Name: num_result_chunks
Columns.Comment: A bound of populated indexes in the lsif_data_result_chunks table for the associated dump. This value is used to hash identifiers into the result chunk index to which they belong.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_metadata_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_metadata_pkey ON lsif_data_metadata USING btree (dump_id)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_references
Tables.Comment: Associates (document, range) pairs with the export monikers attached to the range.

Columns.Name: data
Columns.Comment: A gob-encoded payload conforming to an array of [LocationData](https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/sourcegraph/sourcegraph@3.26/-/blob/enterprise/lib/codeintel/semantic/types.go#L106:6) types.

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table (state=completed).

Columns.Name: identifier
Columns.Comment: The moniker identifier.

Columns.Name: num_locations
Columns.Comment: The number of locations stored in the data field.

Columns.Name: schema_version
Columns.Comment: The schema version of this row - used to determine presence and encoding of data.

Columns.Name: scheme
Columns.Comment: The moniker scheme.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_references_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_references_pkey ON lsif_data_references USING btree (dump_id, scheme, identifier)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_references_dump_id_schema_version
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_references_dump_id_schema_version ON lsif_data_references USING btree (dump_id, schema_version)

Triggers.Name: lsif_data_references_schema_versions_insert
Triggers.Definition: CREATE TRIGGER lsif_data_references_schema_versions_insert AFTER INSERT ON lsif_data_references REFERENCING NEW TABLE AS newtab FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE FUNCTION update_lsif_data_references_schema_versions_insert()

Tables.Name: lsif_data_references_schema_versions
Tables.Comment: Tracks the range of schema_versions for each upload in the lsif_data_references table.

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table.

Columns.Name: max_schema_version
Columns.Comment: An upper-bound on the `lsif_data_references.schema_version` where `lsif_data_references.dump_id = dump_id`.

Columns.Name: min_schema_version
Columns.Comment: A lower-bound on the `lsif_data_references.schema_version` where `lsif_data_references.dump_id = dump_id`.

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_references_schema_versions_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_references_schema_versions_pkey ON lsif_data_references_schema_versions USING btree (dump_id)

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_references_schema_versions_dump_id_schema_version_bou
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX lsif_data_references_schema_versions_dump_id_schema_version_bou ON lsif_data_references_schema_versions USING btree (dump_id, min_schema_version, max_schema_version)

Tables.Name: lsif_data_result_chunks
Tables.Comment: Associates result set identifiers with the (document path, range identifier) pairs that compose the set.

Columns.Name: data
Columns.Comment: A gob-encoded payload conforming to the [ResultChunkData](https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/sourcegraph/sourcegraph@3.26/-/blob/enterprise/lib/codeintel/semantic/types.go#L76:6) type.

Columns.Name: dump_id
Columns.Comment: The identifier of the associated dump in the lsif_uploads table (state=completed).

Columns.Name: idx
Columns.Comment: The unique result chunk index within the associated dump. Every result set identifier present should hash to this index (modulo lsif_data_metadata.num_result_chunks).

Indexes.Name: lsif_data_result_chunks_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX lsif_data_result_chunks_pkey ON lsif_data_result_chunks USING btree (dump_id, idx)

Indexes.Name: migration_logs_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX migration_logs_pkey ON migration_logs USING btree (id)

Indexes.Name: rockskip_ancestry_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX rockskip_ancestry_pkey ON rockskip_ancestry USING btree (id)

Indexes.Name: rockskip_ancestry_repo_id_commit_id_key
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX rockskip_ancestry_repo_id_commit_id_key ON rockskip_ancestry USING btree (repo_id, commit_id)

Indexes.Name: rockskip_ancestry_repo_commit_id
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX rockskip_ancestry_repo_commit_id ON rockskip_ancestry USING btree (repo_id, commit_id)

Indexes.Name: rockskip_repos_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX rockskip_repos_pkey ON rockskip_repos USING btree (id)

Indexes.Name: rockskip_repos_repo_key
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX rockskip_repos_repo_key ON rockskip_repos USING btree (repo)

Indexes.Name: rockskip_repos_last_accessed_at
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX rockskip_repos_last_accessed_at ON rockskip_repos USING btree (last_accessed_at)

Indexes.Name: rockskip_repos_repo
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX rockskip_repos_repo ON rockskip_repos USING btree (repo)

Indexes.Name: rockskip_symbols_pkey
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX rockskip_symbols_pkey ON rockskip_symbols USING btree (id)

Indexes.Name: rockskip_symbols_gin
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX rockskip_symbols_gin ON rockskip_symbols USING gin (singleton_integer(repo_id) gin__int_ops, added gin__int_ops, deleted gin__int_ops, name gin_trgm_ops, singleton(name), singleton(lower(name)), path gin_trgm_ops, singleton(path), path_prefixes(path), singleton(lower(path)), path_prefixes(lower(path)), singleton(get_file_extension(path)), singleton(get_file_extension(lower(path))))

Indexes.Name: rockskip_symbols_repo_id_path_name
Indexes.IndexDefinition: CREATE INDEX rockskip_symbols_repo_id_path_name ON rockskip_symbols USING btree (repo_id, path, name)
